description: Ride with Lucky and her friends in our Spirit: Adventures on Horses puzzle trio! Join the adventures of the spunky Fortuna “Lucky” Esperanza Navarro Prescott, and her best friends Pru and Abigail! Lucky has an incredibly tight bond with a Kiger mustang, the wild stallion Spirit, while Pru owns a talented palomino named Chica Linda, and Abigail has a goofy but brave American Paint horse called Boomerang. Together they experience many thrills as they learn what it means to be truly free. A delightful puzzle set for any young fan of the animated TV series! Puzzles help develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving through repeated practice while delivering tons of fun! Our three 49-piece puzzles have large, durable pieces little hands can easily hold on to for lots of repeat fun and come with handy, full-size picture guides. Clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s tight interlocking fit provide a pleasurable puzzling experience for children and their adult helpers alike. Our Perfect Age Fit criteria ensures this puzzle is fun and educational for ages 5 and up!
